'''Treasure Hoarders''' can be encountered as enemies. They are found all over [[Teyvat]].

==Types==
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Scout}} &mdash; They primarily attack with throwing knives
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Marksman}} &mdash; Armed with a crossbow
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Seaman}} &mdash; Armed with an oar
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Handyman}} &mdash; Hand-to-hand combatants, they prefer kicks instead of punches
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Crusher}} &mdash; Armed with a hammer
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Gravedigger}} &mdash; Armed with a shovel, they dig up soil to impair vision
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist}} &mdash; Hand-to-hand combatants

;Potioneers
Alchemists who brew concoctions to deal Elemental damage.
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer}}
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Electro Potioneer}}
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Hydro Potioneer}}
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Pyro Potioneer}}

;Elites
High-ranking members serving as event or quest-exclusive fights.
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Raptor}} &mdash; Armed with a crossbow able to send flaming arrows, swift on his feet
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Boss}} &mdash; Armed with an axe for close combat that she can also throw
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Carmen}} &mdash; Armed with a shovel for fast melee and ranged attacks
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Liuliu}} &mdash; Armed with molotovs and a crossbow able to send flaming arrows
*{{Enemy|Treasure Hoarders: Wallenstein}} &mdash; Armed with a hammer with deadlier swings
